<ce:section-title id="st040">Synthesis of [ZnL(bimb)]·DMF (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">A mixture of Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.0297<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>L (0.0333<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), bimb (0.0296<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), were added to N,N-Dimethylformamide (DMF 8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL). The final mixture was placed in a Teflon reactor (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and heated at 80<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. After gradually cooling to room temperature at a rate of 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>, large quantities of colorless block crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethyl alcohol absolute, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 59% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C<ce:inf loc="post">35</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">30</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>Zn (%): C, 61.81; H, 4.44; N, 12.36. Found: C, 61.87; H, 4.48; N, 12.31. FT-IR (4000–600<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3133 (m), 1665 (s), 1593 (s), 1532 (s), 1489 (m), 1362 (s), 1313(s), 1279 (s), 1070 (s), 960 (m), 784 (s), 656(m).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st045">Synthesis of [ZnL(bimb)]·6(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">0.5</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">A mixture of Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.0297<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>L (0.0333<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), bimb (0.0296<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) was placed in a Teflon reactor (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and heated at 160<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. After gradually cooling to room temperature at a rate of 20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>, large quantities of colorlessblock crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethanol, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 61% based on bimb. Elemental analysis for C<ce:inf loc="post">64</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">52</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (%): C, 60.62; H, 4.13; N, 11.04. Found: C, 60.78; H, 3.96; N, 11.15. FT-IR (4000–600<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3133 (m), 1596 (s), 1665 (s), 1592 (s), 1365 (s), 1070 (m), 944 (m), 837 (s), 783 (m), 657 (m), 531 (m).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st050">Synthesis of [ZnL(bimp)<ce:inf loc="post">0.5</ce:inf>]·3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0045" view="all">Similarly, the procedure of preparing compound <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> is equal to the procedure of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> by replacement of bimb by bimp (0.0211<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol). Large quantities of colorless block crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethyl alcohol absolute, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 64% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C<ce:inf loc="post">51</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">35</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">13</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (%): C, 56.47; H, 3.25; N, 9.04. Found: C, 56.17; H, 3.08; N, 9.38. FT-IR (4000–600<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3145 (m), 1678 (s), 1595 (s), 1536 (s), 1488 (m), 1390 (s), 1309 (s), 1247 (s), 1072 (s), 959 (m), 781 (s), 649 (m).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st055">Synthesis of [ZnL(bimp)]·7H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (<ce:bold>4</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0050" view="all">Similarly, the procedure of preparing compound <ce:bold>4</ce:bold> is equal to the procedure of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> by replacement of bimb by bimp (0.0211<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol). Large quantities of colorlessblock crystals were obtained, filtered off, washed with ethanol, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 52% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C<ce:inf loc="post">31</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">36</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>Zn (%): C, 50.72; H, 4.94; N, 11.45. Found: C, 50.46; H, 4.65; N, 11.89. FT-IR (4000–600<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3145 (m), 1630 (s),1595 (s), 1536 (s), 1390 (s), 1090 (m), 945 (m), 840 (m), 781 (m), 649 (m), 552(m) 
<ce:float-anchor refid="f0030"></ce:float-anchor>.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of [ZnL(bimb)]⋅DMF (1)

A mixture of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.0297g, 0.1mmol), H2L (0.0333g, 0.1mmol), bimb (0.0296g, 0.1mmol), were added to N,N-Dimethylformamide (DMF 8mL) and H2O (2mL). The final mixture was placed in a Teflon reactor (20mL) and heated at 80°C for 3days. After gradually cooling to room temperature at a rate of 10°Ch-1, large quantities of colorless block crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethyl alcohol absolute, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 59% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C35H30N6O5Zn (%): C, 61.81; H, 4.44; N, 12.36. Found: C, 61.87; H, 4.48; N, 12.31. FT-IR (4000-600cm-1): 3133 (m), 1665 (s), 1593 (s), 1532 (s), 1489 (m), 1362 (s), 1313(s), 1279 (s), 1070 (s), 960 (m), 784 (s), 656(m).

Synthesis of [ZnL(bimb)]⋅6(H2O)0.5 (2)

A mixture of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.0297g, 0.1mmol), H2L (0.0333g, 0.1mmol), bimb (0.0296g, 0.1mmol), H2O (10mL) was placed in a Teflon reactor (20mL) and heated at 160°C for 3days. After gradually cooling to room temperature at a rate of 20°Ch-1, large quantities of colorlessblock crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethanol, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 61% based on bimb. Elemental analysis for C64H52N10O11Zn2 (%): C, 60.62; H, 4.13; N, 11.04. Found: C, 60.78; H, 3.96; N, 11.15. FT-IR (4000-600cm-1): 3133 (m), 1596 (s), 1665 (s), 1592 (s), 1365 (s), 1070 (m), 944 (m), 837 (s), 783 (m), 657 (m), 531 (m).

Synthesis of [ZnL(bimp)0.5]⋅3H2O (3)

Similarly, the procedure of preparing compound 3 is equal to the procedure of 1 by replacement of bimb by bimp (0.0211g, 0.1mmol). Large quantities of colorless block crystals were obtained and the crystals were filtered off, washed with ethyl alcohol absolute, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 64% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C51H35N7O13Zn2 (%): C, 56.47; H, 3.25; N, 9.04. Found: C, 56.17; H, 3.08; N, 9.38. FT-IR (4000-600cm-1): 3145 (m), 1678 (s), 1595 (s), 1536 (s), 1488 (m), 1390 (s), 1309 (s), 1247 (s), 1072 (s), 959 (m), 781 (s), 649 (m).

Synthesis of [ZnL(bimp)]⋅7H2O (4)

Similarly, the procedure of preparing compound 4 is equal to the procedure of 2 by replacement of bimb by bimp (0.0211g, 0.1mmol). Large quantities of colorlessblock crystals were obtained, filtered off, washed with ethanol, and dried under ambient conditions. Yield of the reaction was 52% based on bimb. Elemental analysis calcd for C31H36N6O11Zn (%): C, 50.72; H, 4.94; N, 11.45. Found: C, 50.46; H, 4.65; N, 11.89. FT-IR (4000-600cm-1): 3145 (m), 1630 (s),1595 (s), 1536 (s), 1390 (s), 1090 (m), 945 (m), 840 (m), 781 (m), 649 (m), 552(m)  .
